text: Adam Coscia presented VisPile at the 2025 Georgia Tech Career, Research, and Innovation Development Conference. He won a travel award!

Arpit Narechania passed his PhD Dissertation Defense! He will be an Assistant Professor at The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) starting Spring 2025. Congratulations, Dr. Narechania!
Grace Guo passed her PhD Dissertation Defense! She will be a Postdoctoral Fellow at the Visual Computing Group at Harvard starting this Fall 2024. Congratulations, Dr. Guo!
Our lab presented our latest work at ACM CHI 2024 in Honolulu, Hawai'i!
